metadata.dc:author: Schuppan, Detlef
metadata.dc:description: Liver fibrosis pathogenesis,potencial antifibrotic agents and serum markers of liver fibrosis are briefly reviewed in this paper.
metadata.dc:title: Liver Fibrosis:Pathogenesis, prevention and treatment.
[LIVER FIBROSIS: PATHOGENESIS,PREVENTION AND TREATMENT]
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de gastroenterologia del Peru : organo oficial de la Sociedad de Gastroenterologia del Peru
